title: S12 Ep36: Beyond the Darkness meets The Ghost Brothers!
itunes:title: Beyond the Darkness meets The Ghost Brothers!
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS meets The Ghost Brothers!
Dalen Spratt, Juwan Mass & Marcus Harvey stop by to discuss the new season of The Ghost Brothers which airs Friday nights on TLC 9/8 cst Favorite locations, Scary moments and fun times with the new TV Ghost hunting trio.
https://www.tlc.com/tv-shows/ghost-brothers-on-tlc/
